评论概述: Such a classic, fun top for dressing up just a little
评论详情: I first wore this on a birthday trip to LA in November, it was perfect! Light and airy, but still a little bit dressy and fun! I’ve worn it plenty since and just love it every time!
The eyelet top is super cute on.  It fits true to size.  I would recommend a cami under it. you can dress it up or wear with jeans. Very comfortable and i get lots of compliments when wearing it.
The fabric and construction of this top are low quality.  It looks very cheap.

评论概述: True to size and surprisingly quality seems quite good for this price.
评论详情: I liked everything, the way it was packed, the way it fit and the style. I got a small, am 5’3” and weigh 123lbs.
I bought the Light Pink & Hot Pink. I think the light pink is more a Light Salmon. It is NOT lined, so you do need to wear something under the shirt. True to size. Beautiful!
Liked the shape and fit. When I purchased another one the same  size, it didn’t fit.

Be mindful this is total lace so it will be see through. With that said; I love the way it fits and looks. I plan on wearing a black cami under it but it is flattering and feels well made and the fabric is nice too. I got black in large which is my normal size for more fitted blouses.

I ordered a large. I’m 5’10, I wear a size 10/12. B bra 36”. Fit me perfect. Love the cut of this top, not short, not long, just right. The material is good quality, I washed it on delicate on its own a hung it to dry, looks great. You must wear a tank underneath it. I chose the burgundy red, it’s beautiful.
The fit and eyelet pattern on this top are beautiful!

I wore this black top in the winter over a black long sleeve bodysuit, with black pants and boots. It felt very stylish and flattering with tight pants. It’s versatile and could be worn over a sleeveless bodysuit instead for cooler weather. It doesn’t have much stretch, but also wasn’t restricting. I’m 5’4”, 124lbs, 34C, size 2/4 pants, and bought the small. It was loose without being baggy.  Note: this top is unlined and the holes are see-through and plentiful. If you don’t want your bra showing, it must be layered with an undershirt/bodysuit.

Ordered white, pale blue and pale pink. The white and blue are lovely. The pink color is not pale and is way too strong for the dainty pattern. Returned it. Comfortable and got lots of compliments on the others.

This blouse is so beautiful and I am in Love! I purchased the khaki color and a small. I’m 5’3” 124lbs. This shirt is not skin tight and I can wear a lightweight shirt under since it is see through. Would highly recommend!!
This fit perfectly. I love the design and length of sleeves.

This blouse is just beautiful!  I have difficulty with blouses as I'm busty and not a lot fits properly, especially button downs and just a lot of tops bought on Amazon.  I always size up because of it.  So, for those who need this info, I am a 42DD, 5'4" and 150 lbs.  The XL is a perfect fit without pulling at the bust.  I highly recommend.

I have been eyeing this blouse for some time and decided to purchase it and I am so happy I did. For ample bossoms, I recommend sizing up. It is made from cotton and nylon (no stretch, but it is flowy on the body). I purchased white and it is a true white. Comfortable fit and value for the money. The sleeves are perfect on me. For reference I am 5'1 with a short torso kinda short arms. If you wear a nude bra, you do not need to wear a camisole under the blouse. Very feminine and makes you feel gorgeous.

评论概述: Very pretty - runs small I believe
评论详情: UPDATE:  ordered the Large in white and beige.  The white showed up first and was very Large and it was just too sloppy looking on.  That Large measured 22” across from pit to pit when laying flat and 24” from shoulder to bottom hem.  The beige Large arrived and it measured 21 inches frompit to pit and 23 inches in length.  Clearly you just don’t know what will arrive.  Fortunately the beige Large fit fine now.Very pretty blouse.  I liked it more than I thought I would  LOL  Good length in the front so not necessary to tuck or do the front tuck.  For sizing, I am 5-2, 145 pounds and 36 bust.  I ordered the medium and it was still a bit snug at the top.  Like if you move your arms forward, very tight and also tight in the armpit area.  Shoulder seams are where they should be but I will try the next size up.  The medium did measure 20-1/4" from pit to pit and my other blouses that measure the same aren't tight.  I can't figure it out.  They are currently sold out in the Large/Beige, so I will wait for it to come back and then update my review for sizing.

I'm a picky shopper. For reference I'm 5'2 140 lbs (and losing/dieting) slightly busty (bra 36C). This shirt is PERFECTION! And I rarely ever say that. The sleeves are the perfect length hitting right at the wrist and the shirt length is also perfect hits mid crotch on me making it cute left out, tucked, or 1/2 tucked. I bought it in the M and the L because of bust fit uncertainty. The medium fits perfectly everywhere with the right bra (a minimizer bra). Any other bra & its maybe 1/8 in snug through the boobs. But I'm losing weight so itll fit perfectly in another week or two. I am glad I ordered the large for a looser boob fit so I will have two white blouses if I stain one. Want one in every color but already have a lot of light blue. Navy and red or wine please!!!!!!!!
The top is nice. However, for me the sleeves are short.

评论概述: Very pretty and true to size

It’s long enough to tuck in but also looks good tucked out. The versatility is my favorite. Not sure if this will help anyone but there isn’t any pull in the shoulders when I move. The sleeves are perfect.
It’s adorable and true to size.  May order in another color as well.
